title: Delete CDR
body:
Think about it... this stat is secretly what is wrong with this game.

"Whaaa tanks do too much damage while building tanky!" 

- cdr lets them use their base skills (and damage associated) more often....

There are other examples, but the gist is that CDR is a stat people get just by buying what they usually would and abusing the shorter CDs to snowball even harder. 

Delete CDR and this game would be much easier to balance, and as a result much more stable, fair gameplay
